title: Your chance to Chase What Matters
author: Yankeefan51

posts.post_title: Your chance to Chase What Matters
posts.post_content:
A $10,000 bill bears the face of Samuel Chase...
$10,000 can be your if you can sell or trade us
a select group of high grade rare type cards
from the list below.  All transactions must be
completed by August 2, 2010

Thanks,

Bruce Dorskind
[url]bdorskind@dorskindgroup.com[/url]


   America’s Toughest Want List

Clements Brothers  D-3805+
WilliamsE 1036+
Texas Tommy  E 224 (type I) 5+
Texas Tommy   E 225 (type 2)
Tip Top Baltimore4+
Philadelphia Caramel   E-967+

Crowly Milk- 19406

It's actually Salmon Chase...but why quibble?:)

We did make a typo, sorry Mr. Chase.

Jim your needling remarks brought attention to our thread.

Since it was launched we have picked up 3 high grade type
cards for a total expenditure of $4300.

Keep up the good work!


Bruce Dorskind
America's Toughest Want List

[quote name="Yankeefan51" post=825071]Since it was launched we have picked up 3 high grade type
cards for a total expenditure of $4300.[/QUOTE]

But of course you did. We would not have expected any less. In fact, several of my "sorted followers" (sic) projected an even greater closure rate. 


For the record, Bruce, "Samuel" instead of "Salmon" and "sorted" instead of "sordid" aren't typos. They are just a general lack of intelligence.
Three high grade type cards for an expenditure of $4300....Hmmmm. Color me skeptical.:confused:

[quote name="barrysloate" post=825093]Three high grade type cards for an expenditure of $4300....Hmmmm. Color me skeptical.:confused:[/QUOTE]

It was a typo. Should have been $4.3 million.

This is the BST... Let's stop responding to bruce's posts, I'm as tired as anyone of seeing them, but all you guys are doing is keeping it front and center and at the top of the list.

Can't 5 people sell new things just so it can be pushed down the list and out of sight?

[quote name="cozmokramer" post=825107]This is the BST... Let's stop responding to bruce's posts, I'm as tired as anyone of seeing them, but all you guys are doing is keeping it front and center and at the top of the list.

Can't 5 people sell new things just so it can be pushed down the list and out of sight?[/QUOTE]

Just post in the pickup thread instead.

C'mon, Cosmo, it's a slow Sunday on FiveFour and everybody loves it when Bruce posts. It's so entertaining. Plus in the meantime it has enabled him to close mega-million dollar business deals, acquire ultra high grade cards by the handful (although ATWL never seems to reflect that, haven't quite figured out why), kill militants in Pakistan, and get laid by movie starlets. Let's help a guy out.
............it only bothers you if you let it.
If it's annoying Cosmo you can post on my BST thread. I welcome the company.
